channel.title: Chat Box, Hyperlink?
channel.description: I want to make a hyperlink, in my chatbox on my server when they login. I saw someone with one before, and the words when you clicked it, made it go to the forums site.. Would it be [url=http://www.w\e.com]W\E[/url] , or www.w\e.com>w\e , or something else?
